article.name: Space 01 version 3
article.description:
A flash animation:
\"Inspired by Gonz, produced by Markavian.\"
... and to reinforce this animation, I produced a close up of the final flash image, a closer view of.. that thing.
article.keywords: thing, that, produced, gonz, david levy, markavian, production, flash, macromedia, grey, alien, space, ships, fried turkey.
